entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 03:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 9.0°C
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 8.4°C
Wind: SE 33 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 50 to 70 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming southeast 30 before morning. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
